statements: SELECT * FROM compliance_ai_systems
SELECT system_name, compliance_score FROM compliance_ai_systems ORDER BY compliance_score DESC
SELECT system_name, compliance_date FROM compliance_ai_systems WHERE compliance_score > 0.8
SELECT system_name, compliance_score FROM compliance_ai_systems WHERE compliance_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM compliance_ai_systems ORDER BY compliance_date ASC
SELECT system_id, system_name, compliance_score, compliance_date FROM compliance_ai_systems WHERE compliance_score > 90 ORDER BY compliance_score DESC
SELECT * FROM compliance_ai_systems WHERE compliance_date >= '2021-01-01' AND compliance_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY compliance_date ASC
SELECT system_name, compliance_score FROM compliance_ai_systems WHERE compliance_score IS NOT NULL ORDER BY system_name ASC
SELECT system_name, compliance_score FROM compliance_ai_systems WHERE compliance_date = '2022-06-15' AND compliance_score < 70 ORDER BY compliance_score ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_systems, AVG(compliance_score) AS avg_score FROM compliance_ai_systems WHERE compliance_score >= 80
SELECT * FROM ai_ethical_compliance;
SELECT system_id, system_name FROM ai_ethical_compliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT system_id, system_name, compliance_status FROM ai_ethical_compliance WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT system_name, compliance_status FROM ai_ethical_compliance ORDER BY system_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulation_standards WHERE compliance_level = 'High';
SELECT system_name, compliance_status FROM ai_ethical_compliance WHERE system_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ai_ethical_compliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT system_name, compliance_status FROM ai_ethical_compliance WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT system_name, compliance_status FROM ai_ethical_compliance ORDER BY system_name DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_level FROM regulation_standards WHERE compliance_level IN ('High', 'Medium');
SELECT * FROM ai_systems;
SELECT system_name, compliance_status FROM ai_systems;
SELECT id, system_name, last_audit_date FROM ai_systems ORDER BY last_audit_date DESC;
SELECT system_name, compliance_status FROM ai_systems WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT regulation_name, description, publication_date FROM regulations;
SELECT * FROM ai_systems WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant' ORDER BY system_name ASC
SELECT system_name, last_audit_date FROM ai_systems WHERE last_audit_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_audit_date DESC

SELECT violations.violation_date, violations.violation_description, ai_systems.system_name FROM violations INNER JOIN ai_systems ON violations.ai_system_id = ai_systems.id WHERE violations.violation_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY violations.violation_date DESC
SELECT ai_systems.system_name, regulations.regulation_name, regulations.description FROM ai_systems INNER JOIN regulations ON ai_systems.id = regulations.id ORDER BY regulations.regulation_name ASC

SELECT ai_systems.system_name, COUNT(violations.id) AS total_violations FROM ai_systems LEFT JOIN violations ON ai_systems.id = violations.ai_system_id GROUP BY ai_systems.system_name HAVING total_violations > 3 ORDER BY total_violations DESC
SELECT system_name, compliance_status FROM AI_Systems;
SELECT * FROM Regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, regulatory_body FROM Regulations WHERE regulatory_body = 'Example Regulatory Body';
SELECT * FROM Standards ORDER BY standard_name DESC;
SELECT system_id, regulation_id, compliance_date FROM System_Compliance WHERE system_id = 1 AND regulation_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM AI_Systems;
SELECT system_name, compliance_status FROM AI_Systems ORDER BY system_id DESC;
SELECT system_name, compliance_status FROM AI_Systems WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Regulations WHERE regulatory_body = 'FDA';
SELECT s.standard_name, sc.compliance_date FROM Standards s JOIN System_Compliance sc ON s.standard_id = sc.standard_id ORDER BY sc.compliance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ai_systems_compliance
SELECT system_name, compliance_score FROM ai_systems_compliance
SELECT system_id, last_audit_date FROM ai_systems_compliance
SELECT * FROM regulations
SELECT regulation_name, regulatory_body FROM regulations
SELECT system_name, compliance_score FROM ai_systems_compliance WHERE compliance_score > 80;
SELECT regulation_name, regulatory_body, description FROM regulations WHERE regulatory_body = 'FDA';
SELECT * FROM standards WHERE issuing_organization = 'ISO';

SELECT system_name, regulation_name FROM ai_systems_compliance JOIN system_regulations ON ai_systems_compliance.system_id = system_regulations.system_id JOIN regulations ON system_regulations.regulation_id = regulations.regulation_id;

SELECT system_name, standard_name, issuing_organization FROM ai_systems_compliance JOIN system_standards ON ai_systems_compliance.system_id = system_standards.system_id JOIN standards ON system_standards.standard_id = standards.standard_id ORDER BY system_name DESC;
